name: RYTHMX
description: Telegram Group Calls streaming bot with some useful features, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max duration (in minutes) for streaming on voice chat.

VIDEO_STREAM_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of video stream at a time the bot will allow.

CLEANMODE_DELETE_MINS.description: Duration (in minutes) after which bot will delete all of it's old messages.

AUTO_LEAVING_ASSISTANT.description: If you want your assistant to leave all chats automatically after some time.

SONG_DOWNLOAD_DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max duration for downloading media (in minutes) by the bot.

PRIVATE_BOT_MODE.description: Set it true, If you want your bot to be private for authorized chats. Else leave it blank

MUSIC_BOT_NAME.description: A name for your Music Bot. Please don't use ascii characters

OWNER_ID.description: The user id(s) of user(s) whom you would like to add as a OWNER. Multiple values shall be seperated with a space.

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory.

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: A group link where your bot users will go and disturb you about your bot

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: A channel link where your bot users will get ti know about your bot updates.

AUTO_DOWNLOADS_CLEAR.description: If you want to delete download files from the bot's server immediately after the stream ends.

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Use only Group. Please don't use Channel ID.

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: If you don't know this, Leave as it is

GIT_TOKEN.description: If your edited repo is private token is needed to fetch it.
